name: CurtainBot
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Now you can use Alexa to control all your Smarthome curtain bot devices! You can turn on/off your curtain bot simply by giving orders to Alexa.Alexa can open / close the curtain in your home.1) Download the CurtainBot App from App Store or Google Play Store, 2) Create a new account and log in, 3) Find and add your curtain bot. 4).Talk to alexa and control your curtain.


Note that this example does not have any disclaimers applicable to specific conditions.
